description: Primary endometrioid adenocarcinoma Grade 1 with less than 50% myometrial invasion, no lymphovascular invasion, and negative lymph nodes consistent with FIGO Stage IA disease.
patient_notes: Your report indicates a low-grade uterine cancer confined to the uterus with minimal invasion and no spread to lymph nodes. This early-stage finding often allows for simple follow-up or localized treatment to reduce recurrence risk. Your care team will discuss the best approach for your situation. Most patients with this stage have a very favorable outlook.

verification.assessment: Staging and subtype information are accurate; however, treatment recommendation should reflect NCCN guideline for low-risk Stage IA Grade 1 endometrioid adenocarcinoma, which is observation only.

recommended_treatment.issues: Recommendation missing; NCCN guidelines for Stage IA grade 1 recommend observation without adjuvant therapy.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Observation (no adjuvant therapy)'. Reason: Recommendation missing; NCCN guidelines for Stage IA grade 1 recommend observation without adjuvant therapy.
